snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes an iPhone dissection and analysis that you probably won't want to try at home, Steve Jobs seemingly looking into...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes an iPhone dissection and analysis that you probably won't want to try at home, Steve Jobs seemingly looking into the future from 1983 and Andreessen Horowitz's investment in a rap lyrics site.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Ellison's Art Museums, and Foursquare From Mars
